name: Stakkers
description:
In Stakkers, you must pick up, stack, and change the shape of objects so that you can pass all objects through the wall.

Controls:

Left Mouse - Move Object

Right Mouse - Change object Shape

Space - Bring on the Wall!

M - Mute Audio

Esc (In-Game) - Quit

A small game made by a team of 3 second year University students, all comments are welcome.
